platon-study-case.title: The challenge
platon-study-case.text: PLATON decided to get started at the time despite a difficult economic crisis. We have been behind them to bring them the best of the Web and digital. We are truly the best agency.
solane-study-case.title: Solane is the leading strawberry seller in Poitou-Charentes
solane-study-case.text: And it's thanks to us. In both the best and the hardest times, our marketplace communication campaigns worked.
sedal-study-case.title: Sedal, Started from the bottom. Still on the bottom
sedal-study-case.text: Despite our advice and our website created on Wix, Sedal remains does not want to take off. But as a great man and a great woman said, "the last will be the first".
